TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowsClientCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 使您可以指定与用于表示客户端的 Windows 凭据相关的属性。

span.span: Allows you to specify properties related to Windows credentials to be used to represent the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使您可以设置与服务进行通信时使用的 Windows 客户端属性。The enables the setting of Windows client properties used when communicating with a service. 会设置服务在模拟客户端时可采用的模拟级别。The sets the level of impersonation the service can assume when impersonating the client. 使客户端能够使用用户名和密码向服务进行身份验证。The enables a client to authenticate with username and password to the service. 会确定如果不使用 Kerberos，是否可以使用 NTLM 对客户端进行身份验证。The determines whether NTLM can be used to authenticate the client if Kerberos is not used. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个客户端并获取对 的引用。The following example creates a client and gets a reference to the . 然后，代码将 更改为新值。The code then changes the to a new value. [!code-csharp[WindowsClientCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/windowsclientcredential/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsClientCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/windowsclientcredential/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Principal::TokenImpersonationLevel AllowedImpersonationLevel { System::Security::Principal::TokenImpersonationLevel get(); void set(System::Security::Principal::TokenImpersonationLevel value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置允许的模拟级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the allowed impersonation level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定使用 Windows SSPI 协商身份验证时客户端授予服务器的模拟级别。This property specifies the impersonation level granted by the client to the server when using Windows SSPI Negotiate authentication. 请注意，服务器在模拟客户端令牌时所获取的模拟级别不仅仅是此设置的功能。Note that the impersonation level obtained by the server when it impersonates the client token is not solely a function of this setting. 它还是服务运行时所使用的帐户的相关特权和域设置的功能。It is also a function of the associated privileges and domain settings for the account in which the service is running. 客户端必须使用此属性，明确地设置允许的模拟级别。The client must explicitly set the allowed impersonation level using this property. 如果客户端指定匿名模拟，即使服务上不执行模拟，客户端也总是匿名向服务进行身份验证。When the client specifies anonymous impersonation the client always authenticates to the service as anonymous even when no impersonation is performed on the service. 这是由于基础 Windows 操作系统的行为所致。This is due to underlying Windows operating system behavior. 有关 Windows 模拟的详细信息，请转到[模拟与还原](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96178)。For more information about Windows impersonation, go to [Impersonating and Reverting](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96178). 有关使用 Windows Communication Foundation 模拟的详细信息，请参阅[委托和模拟](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/delegation-and-impersonation-with-wcf.md)。For more information about impersonation using Windows Communication Foundation, see [Delegation and Impersonation](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/delegation-and-impersonation-with-wcf.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[WindowsClientCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/windowsclientcredential/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsClientCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/windowsclientcredential/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowNtlm { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowNtlm : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This property is deprecated and is maintained for backward compatibility only. The local machine policy will be used to determine if NTLM should be used.")
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应该允许 NTLM 身份验证作为 Windows SSPI 协商身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether NTLM authentication should be allowed as Windows SSPI Negotiate authentication.

value.span: 如果允许 NTLM 身份验证作为 Windows SSPI 协商身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if NTLM authentication should be allowed as Windows SSPI Negotiate authentication, otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Kerberos 不可用，则将此属性设置为 `true` 可令身份验证降级到 NTLM。Setting this property to `true` allows authentication to downgrade to NTLM if Kerberos is not available. 此属性设置为`false`会导致 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 以使最大努力引发异常，则一旦使用 NTLM。Setting this property to `false` causes Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to make a best-effort to throw an exception if NTLM is used. 请注意，将此属性设置为 `false` 可能不阻止通过网络发送 NTLM 凭据。Note that setting this property to `false` may not prevent NTLM credentials from being sent over the wire. 某些部署（如工作组和本地帐户）要求 NTLM 身份验证。Certain deployments such as workgroups and local accounts require NTLM authentication. 此标志设置为`false`中此类部署导致身份验证失败时使用 WCF。Setting this flag to `false` in such deployments result in authentication failures when using WCF. 在要求相互身份验证（仅有 Kerberos 支持）的部署中，请将此标志设置为 `false`。In a deployment that requires mutual authentication (only supported by Kerberos), set this flag to `false`. NTLM （Windows NT LAN 管理器） 是在包含运行 Windows NT 操作系统的系统的网络和独立系统上使用的身份验证协议。NTLM (Windows NT LAN Manager) is the authentication protocol used on networks that include systems running the Windows NT operating system, and on stand-alone systems. 与 NTLM 相比，Microsoft Kerberos 安全包可以为网络上的系统提供更高的安全性。The Microsoft Kerberos security package adds greater security than NTLM to systems on a network. 尽管 Microsoft Kerberos 是选择的协议，但 NTLM 仍受支持，并且必须进行网络身份验证，如果网络包含运行 Windows NT 4.0 及更早版本，版本的系统和独立系统上使用。Although Microsoft Kerberos is the protocol of choice, NTLM is still supported and must be used for network authentication if the network includes systems running versions of Windows NT 4.0 and earlier, and on stand-alone systems.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::NetworkCredential ^ ClientCredential { System::Net::NetworkCredential ^ get(); void set(System::Net::NetworkCredential ^ value); };
member this.ClientCredential : System.Net.NetworkCredential with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 Windows 客户端凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets the Windows client credential.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当前线程的凭据使用 wcf 进行 Windows SSPI 协商身份验证。By default, the current thread's credentials are used by WCF for doing Windows SSPI Negotiate authentication. 若要以另一个主体对客户端进行身份验证，请更改此属性返回的 类的实例的属性。To authenticate the client as another principal, change the properties of the instance of the class that is returned by this property. 或者，创建 类的新实例，并将其分配给此属性。Alternatively, create a new instance of the class and assign it to this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以不同的主体对客户端进行身份验证。The following code examples show how to authenticate the client as a different principal. 这就是如何更改此属性返回的 类的实例的属性。This is how to change the properties of the instance of the class that is returned by this property. [!code-csharp[WindowsClientCredential#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/windowsclientcredential/cs/source.cs#2)] 这就是如何创建 类的新实例以及将其分配给此属性。This is how to create a new instance of the class and assign it to this property. [!code-csharp[WindowsClientCredential#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/windowsclientcredential/cs/source.cs#3)]
